Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Baltimore in 2006...
Injured on 7/24/2009 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/14/2010...
Traded from Baltimore to Cleveland on 1/31/2015 (Going to CLE: P I. Kennedy, P W. LeBlanc, P G. Richards, P C. Perez. Going to BAL: C K. Deglan)...
Had first career hit (double) on 5/30/2015, off Johan Santana (SF)...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Traded from Cleveland to Chicago (N) on 7/7/2020 (Going to CHN: P I. Kennedy, P D. Bundy. Going to CLE: CF H. Walker Jr., P R. Miller, P M. Talbot, P A. Roush)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/16/2020, off Justin Masterson (ATL)...
Struck out 15 batters against Cincinnati on 4/25/2021...
Struck out 15 batters against New York (N) on 5/11/2021...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 2/2/2022 to a 3-year deal worth $8,000,001 per year...
